message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is priced at $1200000 based on its unique features and benefits. Considering the significant importance this product has for you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire an asset that could potentially grow in value over time. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.
